verses.text: The \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* I \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* am also an \w elder|strong="G4850"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* of the \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, and \w also|strong="G2532"\w* a \w partaker|strong="G2844"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* that \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*:

\w Feed|strong="G4165"\w* the \w flock|strong="G4168"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which is \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, taking the \w oversight|strong="G1983"\w* \add thereof\add*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* by \w constraint|strong="G0317"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w willingly|strong="G1596"\w*; \w not|strong="G3366"\w* for filthy \w lucre|strong="G0147"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of a ready \w mind|strong="G4290"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* being lords \w over|strong="G2634"\w* \add Godâ€™s\add* \w heritage|strong="G2819"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w ensamples|strong="G5179"\w* to the \w flock|strong="G4168"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w Shepherd|strong="G0750"\w* shall \w appear|strong="G5319"\w*, ye shall \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* that fadeth not \w away|strong="G0262"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w*, ye \w younger|strong="G3501"\w*, \w submit|strong="G5293"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0240"\w* unto the \w elder|strong="G4245"\w*. \w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add of you\add* be subject one to \w another|strong="G5293"\w*, and be clothed \w with|strong="G1463"\w* \w humility|strong="G5012"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w resisteth|strong="G0498"\w* the \w proud|strong="G5244"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* to the \w humble|strong="G5011"\w*.

Humble \w yourselves|strong="G5013"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w mighty|strong="G2900"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w exalt|strong="G5312"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* due \w time|strong="G2540"\w*:

\w Casting|strong="G1977"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w care|strong="G3308"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w careth|strong="G3199"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

Be \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*, be \w vigilant|strong="G1127"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w adversary|strong="G0476"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w roaring|strong="G5612"\w* \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*, walketh \w about|strong="G4043"\w*, \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* he may \w devour|strong="G2666"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* \w stedfast|strong="G4731"\w* in the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, knowing \w that|strong="G1492"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G3804"\w* are \w accomplished|strong="G2005"\w* in \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0081"\w* that are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, after that ye have \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* a \w while|strong="G3641"\w*, \w make|strong="G2675"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w*, \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w*, \w strengthen|strong="G4599"\w*, \w settle|strong="G2311"\w* \add you\add*.

To \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2904"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w Silvanus|strong="G4610"\w*, a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* I \w suppose|strong="G3049"\w*, I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w briefly|strong="G3641"\w*, \w exhorting|strong="G3870"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testifying|strong="G1957"\w* that \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* the \w true|strong="G0227"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w wherein|strong="G1519"\w* ye \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \add church that is\add* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w*, elected together \w with|strong="G4899"\w* \add you\add*, \w saluteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add so doth\add* \w Marcus|strong="G3138"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.

Greet \w ye|strong="G0782"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w* of \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*. \w Peace|strong="G1515"\w* \add be\add* with \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
